PaymentScheduleTreatment.name: PaymentScheduleTreatment
PaymentScheduleTreatment.description: Contains configuration information for the payment schedule.

Description.description: The user-entered description of the payment schedule treatment.

IsApprovalRequired.description: Indicates whether this payment schedule treatment requires approval or not.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: The user-entered name of the payment schedule treatment.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

PaymentPlanTag.description: A list of key annotations or insights about the payment plan, such as requires approval or recommended, to help guide the user in selecting the most suitable payment plan.

PaymentSchedulePolicyId.description: The ID of the related payment schedule policy.

TriggerSource.description: Indicates the action that caused the payment schedule treatment to be created.
